titles.title: To restrict certain Federal assistance benefits to individuals verified to be citizens of the United States.
To restrict certain Federal assistance benefits to individuals verified to be citizens of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill restricts eligibility for certain federal assistance benefits to an individual who submits, with an application for benefits, specified verification that the individual is a citizen or national of the United States.
